title: Compare 2 works of architecture and patronage

content.question: You have 30 minutes to answer the question. Responses that answer the question directly will receive higher scores than those that simply list characteristics or include irrelevant points. Therefore, spend a few minutes organizing or outlining your response in the blank space provided above each question. (Notes in the blank space will not be graded.) Be sure to analyze each question carefully and choose appropriate examples. Identify your examples as fully as possible. The relationship between an artist or architect and a patron very often shapes the form and content of a work of art or architecture. Identify two works, each from a different art historical period, and name the specific persons who commissioned them. Discuss how the specific interests and intentions of the particular patrons are revealed in each work.

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
